dr.evomodel.treelikelihood
Class NativeNucleotideLikelihoodCore

java.lang.Object
  dr.evomodel.treelikelihood.AbstractLikelihoodCore
      dr.evomodel.treelikelihood.NativeNucleotideLikelihoodCore
All Implemented Interfaces:
LikelihoodCore
public class NativeNucleotideLikelihoodCore
extends AbstractLikelihoodCore

NativeNucleotideLikelihoodCore - An implementation of LikelihoodCore for nucleotides that calls native methods for maximum speed. The native methods should be in a shared library called "NucleotideLikelihoodCore" but the exact name will be system dependent (i.e. "libNucleotideLikelihoodCore.so" or "NucleotideLikelihoodCore.dll").

Version:
$Id: NativeNucleotideLikelihoodCore.java,v 1.14 2006/08/31 14:57:24 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut

Parameters:

Description copied from interface: LikelihoodCore
Calculates pattern log likelihoods at a node.

Parameters:
partials - the partials used to calculate the likelihoods
frequencies - an array of state frequencies
outLogLikelihoods - an array into which the log likelihoods will go
